headline: Backend Developer – Node.js & Serverless in Modern Fintech

description.text:
Build the backbone of fintech at Advisense Are you a backend developer who thrives on solving complex problems, writing clean, scalable code, and working with meaningful data? At Advisense, we’re building powerful tools to tackle real challenges in compliance, risk, and finance—and we want you on our team. This is your chance to shape a modern fintech platform from the inside, together with a small, skilled, and collaborative team. You'll work in a high-impact environment, where your code directly supports smarter, safer financial systems. 
What you’ll do As part of our internal tech team, you’ll focus on building scalable, secure backend services that power our fintech tools. You’ll: 
 Develop serverless functions using Node.js and TypeScript 
  Design and maintain cloud-based microservices and RESTful APIs 
  Drive test-driven development (TDD) and raise the bar for code quality 
  Handle complex data processing for fintech applications 
  Collaborate closely with product and engineering to ship real value 
  Mentor teammates and help foster a supportive, knowledge-sharing culture 
 
 What we’re looking for  You bring a solid backend foundation, a curious mind, and a drive to build things that matter. 
Must-haves 
 2+ years’ professional experience in backend development 
  Proficiency in Node.js and TypeScript 
  Hands-on experience with serverless architecture 
  Strong understanding of microservice design and REST APIs 
  Familiarity with TDD and testing best practices 
  Strong communication skills and a natural team player 
 
Nice-to-haves 
 Experience in fintech (e.g. compliance, risk, AML, fraud, payments) 
  Worked with Palantir Foundry or similar platforms 
  Some experience with React or frontend basics 
  Knowledge of Python or Domain-Specific Languages (DSLs)
 
Why join Advisense? You’ll be part of a tight-knit team of eight fintech professionals who value trust, autonomy, and continuous learning. We combine a startup mindset with the stability of an established company—giving you room to make an impact without the chaos.
 Flexible hybrid work model – balance remote and in-office work 
  Culture of knowledge sharing and mentorship 
  Inclusive, respectful environment where your voice matters 
  Real technical challenges that make a difference
 
About Advisense Advisense is a leading expert firm in financial law, risk management, and corporate governance, with over 450 employees across Europe. We support financial companies in a constantly evolving regulatory environment and work closely with their business operations, management teams, and boards of directors. 
We review applications continuously, so don’t wait—apply as soon as you're ready. To stay GDPR-compliant, we only accept applications through our official portal. Let’s build the future of fintech—together
description.text_formatted:
Build the backbone of fintech at Advisense Are you a backend developer who thrives on solving complex problems, writing clean, scalable code, and working with meaningful data? At Advisense, we’re building powerful tools to tackle real challenges in compliance, risk, and finance—and we want you on our team. This is your chance to shape a modern fintech platform from the inside, together with a small, skilled, and collaborative team. You'll work in a high-impact environment, where your code directly supports smarter, safer financial systems.

What you’ll do As part of our internal tech team, you’ll focus on building scalable, secure backend services that power our fintech tools. You’ll:

  • Develop serverless functions using Node.js and TypeScript
  • Design and maintain cloud-based microservices and RESTful APIs
  • Drive test-driven development (TDD) and raise the bar for code quality
  • Handle complex data processing for fintech applications
  • Collaborate closely with product and engineering to ship real value
  • Mentor teammates and help foster a supportive, knowledge-sharing culture

What we’re looking for You bring a solid backend foundation, a curious mind, and a drive to build things that matter.

Must-haves

  • 2+ years’ professional experience in backend development
  • Proficiency in Node.js and TypeScript
  • Hands-on experience with serverless architecture
  • Strong understanding of microservice design and REST APIs
  • Familiarity with TDD and testing best practices
  • Strong communication skills and a natural team player

Nice-to-haves

  • Experience in fintech (e.g. compliance, risk, AML, fraud, payments)
  • Worked with Palantir Foundry or similar platforms
  • Some experience with React or frontend basics
  • Knowledge of Python or Domain-Specific Languages (DSLs)

Why join Advisense? You’ll be part of a tight-knit team of eight fintech professionals who value trust, autonomy, and continuous learning. We combine a startup mindset with the stability of an established company—giving you room to make an impact without the chaos.

  • Flexible hybrid work model – balance remote and in-office work
  • Culture of knowledge sharing and mentorship
  • Inclusive, respectful environment where your voice matters
  • Real technical challenges that make a difference

About Advisense Advisense is a leading expert firm in financial law, risk management, and corporate governance, with over 450 employees across Europe. We support financial companies in a constantly evolving regulatory environment and work closely with their business operations, management teams, and boards of directors.

We review applications continuously, so don’t wait—apply as soon as you're ready. To stay GDPR-compliant, we only accept applications through our official portal. Let’s build the future of fintech—together
